summary: I am a tech enthusiast from Malta with a passion for software development, game design, and machine learning. I hold an M.Sc. in Machine Learning and Signal Processing and a B.Sc. in Computing Science. My diverse experience includes roles in Data Science, Front End Development, Research, and Assistant Lecturing.
summary1: I have a track record of delivering successful projects, both for academic purposes and personal initiatives. Some of my works can be found on Github. I am a creative problem-solver, known for my sense of humour, and a genuine love for technology. I possess a forward-thinking mentality and have a talent for inspiring and motivating others in a team setting.

university.degree: Masters in Signal Processing and Machine Learning
university.university_about: The Master's program concentrates on the creation and execution of signal processing and machine learning systems. Signal processing involves the utilisation of mathematical techniques to extract and manipulate information from signals, and machine learning utilises trained models to identify patterns in data.
